Imports directory into store

Source: R/utils-import.R
import_directory.Rd

Imports directory into store

import_directory(store, path, read_function, glob = NULL,
  regexp = NULL, recursive = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

store

instance of the store to import data into
path

to directory containing the data files
read_function

function with argument file, ... is passed to this function to supply additionals arguments
glob

see fs::dir_ls()
regexp

see fs::dir_ls()
recursive

see fs::dir_ls()
...

passed to the read_function

Examples

format <- rOstluft::format_rolf()
store <- rOstluft::storage_local_rds("example_rOstluft", format, read.only = FALSE)
#> Local store example_rOstluft initialized under 'C:\Users\tom\AppData\Local\rOstluft\example_rOstluft'
path <- system.file("extdata", package = "rOstluft.data")

rOstluft::import_directory(store, path, rOstluft::read_airmo_csv, glob = "*Jan.csv")
#> Importing 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_d1_2013_Jan.csv' with size 25.4K. File 1 of 3
#> Read 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_d1_2013_Jan.csv' in 0.07 seconds. Got 2170 data points
#> Put data into store example_rOstluft in 0.05 seconds
#> Importing 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_h1_2013_Jan.csv' with size 142K. File 2 of 3
#> Read 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_h1_2013_Jan.csv' in 0.10 seconds. Got 14116 data points
#> Put data into store example_rOstluft in 0.08 seconds
#> Importing 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_min30_2013_Jan.csv' with size 258K. File 3 of 3
#> Read 'D:/tom/Documents/R/win-library/3.5/rOstluft.data/extdata/Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_min30_2013_Jan.csv' in 0.14 seconds. Got 28234 data points
#> Put data into store example_rOstluft in 0.13 seconds
#> Finished import after 0.57 seconds

store$destroy("DELETE")
#> Store example_rOstluft destroyed
